entry.title: KFG-12 (PRE-ORDER)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Garlands
Price: 14.00

PRE-ORDER FOR AUGUST 2021

Add a pop of colour with this beautiful felt garland. The perfect finishing touch to brighten up your home, to adorn any living space or wrap around shelves, doorways and windows. Made out of 100% wool, using only soap and warm water.


size: 65" Length  Flower 4.5" Center Ball 1" 
composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material.
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover.
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
